lead_paragraph: When three friends discover a mysterious machine in their neighbor's apartment that is capable of taking pictures 24 hours into the future, they encounter a number of pressing questions, not least of which is the whereabouts of their neighbor. Realizing the potential impact of the machine, Finn, Jasper, and Callie attempt to cash in on their discovery. But, when a dangerous criminal learns their secret, the friends must set aside their differences and confront the paradox of a future that was once predetermined and entirely uncertain.
